name: Think Money
overview:
Think Money is one of the largest and longest-running financial services and advice providers in the UK, helping people find the best way of managing their finances, whether that means providing budgeting advice, assisting them with debt problems, helping them find insurance, mortgages, loansâ€¦

So the company has developed a wide range of financial solutions. Since it began in 1993, it has helped hundreds of thousands of people with their finances.

As a result, it has built a solid reputation for delivering a professional and dedicated service to clients.
